sentence: Center Brian Allen (55) could have his hands full with defenders in the middle.
author: Barry Wilner
title: NFC Matchup: Old West rivals meet for Super Bowl berth

sentence: The interior line contains two draft picks — center Brian Allen and left guard David Edwards — along with right guard Austin Corbett, a trade acquisition from Cleveland in 2019.
author: GREG BEACHAM
title: Bold, brash Rams pair flashy superstars with rock-solid core

sentence: Since Monday, when teams could start negotiating with other teams’ free agents, the Rams have not announced any acquisitions, while they’ve re-signed tackle Joe Noteboom – groomed as retiring left tackle Andrew Whitworth’s successor – and center Brian Allen and guard-center Coleman Shelton.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams lose Von Miller after Bills come with cash
